entry.title: New release for Plex Prerolls: v3.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ADDED] Use cookies when downloading from YouTube (see documentation)
  • [FIXED] YouTube downloading failing due to outdated yt-dlp dependency
  • [FIXED] Webhook processing throwing errors due to unexpected payloads

Related PRs

  • Ignore invalid webhook requests by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/plex-prerolls/pull/27 (closes #26)
  • yt-dlp upgrade to 2025.03.26 by @halfskye in https://github.com/nwithan8/plex-prerolls/pull/19 (closes #18 )
  • Modules: youtube_downloader: cookies file option for yt-dlp via config by @halfskye in https://github.com/nwithan8/plex-prerolls/pull/20 (closes #16)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/plex-prerolls/compare/3.1.0...3.2.0

entry.title: New release for Plex Prerolls: v4.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [BREAKING] The CRON_SCHEDULE and DRY_RUN environmental variables have now been moved to a new run section in the config.yaml file. Please see example.
  • [ADDED] Script will auto-restart if errors occurred on previous execution (prevent script from stalling)
  • [IMPROVED] API performance improved by running as standalone script rather than separate thread

Related PRs

  • Handle script crashes by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/plex-prerolls/pull/28

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/plex-prerolls/compare/3.2.0...4.0.0

entry.title: New release for Plex Prerolls: v4.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ADDED] New API endpoint to check if last successful run was within a specified timeframe
  • Timestamp for each successful run is logged to a file
  • Request to endpoint can be used as a Docker healthcheck (returns 200 if timeframe valid, 400/500 if not or error)
    • NOTE: Initial healthchecks may fail as the timestamp file is empty until written to after first run.

Related PRs

  • Add healthcheck endpoint for Docker by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/plex-prerolls/pull/30

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/plex-prerolls/compare/4.0.0...4.1.0
